api

类 Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.Hand
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Hand>

    public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Hand>
    A Hand represents a collection of cards satisfying some criteria defined by an instance of IEvaluator. A hand has zero or more main cards that determine whether it satisfies the evaluator's criteria, plus zero or more side cards that are irrelevant to the evaluator's criteria but may be used to determine a winning hand when the main cards are the same, disregarding suits. This class is immutable.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      Constructs a new Hand from the given cards.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Hand

        public Hand(Card[] mainCards,
    Card[] sideCards,
    IEvaluator evaluator)
        Constructs a new Hand from the given cards. The number of mainCards given must match the number of required cards specified by the given evaluator and the main card array must be ordered so that lexicographic comparison with another array satisfying the same evaluator will correctly order the hands. The number of side cards given must be sufficient to complete the total size of the hand as specified by the evaluator, and the side cards must be ordered according to the compareTo method of the Card class. It is the responsibility of the caller to ensure that the main cards satisfy the criteria of the evaluator.
        参数:
        mainCards - main cards for the hand
        sideCards - side cards for the hand
        evaluator - reference to an IEvaluator whose criteria are satisfied by this hand
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of main cards is incorrect or the number of side cards is insufficient
